meanings.definition: In a manner lacking skill or expertise.
meanings.sent1: She painted the picture unskillfully, with messy brushstrokes.
meanings.sent2: He played the piano unskillfully, hitting the wrong keys.
meanings.sent3: The chef unskillfully attempted to juggle knives in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: The dancer moved unskillfully across the stage, tripping over her own feet.
meanings.sent5: The mechanic unskillfully fixed the car, causing more damage than before.

meanings.sent1: The unskillfully made cake was burnt and lopsided.
meanings.sent2: She was unskillfully trying to sew a button back on her shirt.
meanings.sent3: The unskillfully built house had crooked walls and leaky ceilings.
meanings.sent4: His unskillfully written essay was full of spelling errors and awkward sentences.
meanings.sent5: The unskillfully drawn map led them in the wrong direction.
